purpose: Displays a read-only summary of all loaded world configuration files (schema, eras, pressures, generators) with stat counts and a button to proceed to the simulation run
Composes the full simulation monitoring view by arranging live progress, epoch timeline, population metrics, template usage, diagnostics, and log stream panels from a shared simulation state object
Renders a colored icon-and-label badge representing the current simulation run status (idle, running, paused, complete, etc.)
Shows the current simulation progress as a labeled progress bar alongside the simulation status badge, falling back to an empty bar when no progress data is available
Displays the five most recent simulation epochs as a scrollable timeline with per-epoch entity counts and active pressure gauges
Shows a breakdown of current entity population counts by kind and subtype, sourced from the latest population report or epoch stats
Lists how many times each generation template and simulation system has fired, with an option to reveal unused templates
Presents post-simulation diagnostic data in a tabbed panel covering entity breakdown, relationship breakdown, agent catalyst stats, and notable entities
Renders a collapsible, filterable stream of simulation log messages with per-level counts and a clear button
Presents completed simulation results in a tabbed interface covering a summary overview and per-entity-kind entity tables, with a button to start a new run

Orchestrates the full simulation run experience: manages run state, communicates with the simulation worker, exposes run/pause/step/abort controls, and routes between parameter editing, live dashboard, and results views
Renders a grid of numeric inputs for configuring simulation run parameters such as scale factor, epoch length, and max ticks before a run starts
Renders the contextual action buttons (run, pause, step, abort, reset, view results, run-until-valid) appropriate for the current simulation state, plus a validity search progress indicator
Shows the current engine configuration as formatted JSON in a collapsible panel with a copy-to-clipboard button and a link to open debug settings
Provides a full-page editor for setting per-subtype population growth targets, auto-generating defaults from the schema when none exist
Renders numeric inputs grouped by entity kind so the user can set individual population targets for each entity subtype
Visualizes how a graph contagion system spreads a property across entities over simulation ticks by rendering node/edge snapshots at a selected tick
Renders a heatmap grid showing a 2-D plane diffusion system's field values at a selected simulation tick, with optional auto-scaling of the color range
Re-exports the graph contagion visualization that displays how a contagion spreads across the entity graph at a chosen simulation tick
Displays a multi-view panel (swimlane and other views) summarizing when and how often each simulation system fired across all ticks
Renders a 2-D color grid representing the spatial field values of a plane diffusion system snapshot at a given tick, with optional dynamic color scaling

Provides the main interactive simulation trace viewer that overlays pressure curves, template/action/system event swimlanes, and era boundaries on a shared time axis with click-to-inspect event details
Renders SVG line paths for each visible pressure over the tick range using pre-computed scales, with grid lines and labeled axes
Renders horizontally separated swim lanes for each simulation event type (templates, actions, system events), drawing interactive tick markers that respond to hover and click selection
Draws a horizontal SVG era timeline bar with labeled colored segments for each era and transition markers between them
Renders a positioned tooltip showing pressure values or event details for the currently hovered tick or event in the simulation trace chart
Wraps the visx useTooltip hook to provide tooltip state and positioning helpers for the simulation trace visualization
Renders a labeled dropdown for selecting a single value from a list of options, with an optional searchable popover mode for large option sets
Lets users build a multi-value selection by typing to filter and clicking to add or remove chip-style tags from an available options list
Renders a popover trigger that opens a searchable list of items so users can pick one by filtering by name
Renders a row of colored level-selection rectangles (and an optional numeric input) that let users pick a named ordinal level from a predefined scale
Renders a controlled numeric input that validates, clamps, and commits values only on blur or Enter, supporting integer mode and an optional empty value
Renders a textarea that maintains a local draft while the user types and commits the value to the parent only on blur, preventing disruptive re-renders during editing
Renders a toggle switch with an optional label that calls back with the new boolean value when clicked
Renders a small icon-only button with optional danger styling and a tooltip title
Renders a styled informational callout box with an optional title and arbitrary child content
Renders a labeled section heading with an optional icon, item count badge, description, and right-aligned action slot
Renders a centered empty-state placeholder with an optional icon, title, description, and call-to-action content when a list has no items
Renders a collapsible category group with a header that shows item count and enable-all toggle, and a configurable grid of rendered items below
Renders a dashed card-shaped button that triggers an add action when clicked or activated via keyboard
Renders a compact inline button with a plus prefix for adding a new item to a list
Provides a full-screen modal frame with a header, optional sidebar tab navigation, optional footer, and overlay-click-to-close behavior
Renders a labeled row with a name, optional child controls, and an optional remove button for use inside list editors
Lets users map pressure IDs to numeric delta values by selecting a pressure from a dropdown and entering an amount, with rows for each active mapping
Renders a red validation badge showing an error count, or nothing when the count is zero
Renders a warning badge indicating that an item is not assigned to any era, or nothing if the item is not orphaned
Renders a compact numeric badge inside a tab header to indicate how many validation issues that tab's content has
Renders a capped row of era name chips for an item, showing up to a configurable maximum and summarizing any remainder as an overflow count
Displays the full structured seed context for a chronicle entry, including narrative style, role assignments, temporal context, and relationship data in a read-only layout
Wraps ChronicleSeedViewer in a dismissible overlay modal for viewing a chronicle generation seed from wiki or detail pages
Wraps ChronicleSeedViewer in a collapsible toggle section for embedding seed inspection inline within validation UIs
Manages a local draft string that stays in sync with an external value prop and commits changes to the parent only when the input loses focus
Manages the selected-item ID and CRUD operations (add, update, duplicate, remove, reorder) for a list editor, with optional persistence of the selection to localStorage
Manages loading, creating, switching, saving, importing, exporting, and deleting domain configuration projects stored in IndexedDB, seeding the default project on first use
